QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct ch.person_id as PersonId, replace('stage ' || coalesce(stage_prefix, '') || ' '|| coalesce(stage, ''), ' ', ' ') as source_value, note_date, neoplasm_histology_key, 1147127 as meas_event_field_concept_id from {sc}.onc_stage l JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND l.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where stage != '' order by 1
